title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, October 21, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Ursula K. Le Guin (1929-2018). Best known for her fantasy series Earthsea, she also wrote children’s books, poetry, essays, fiction, and non-fiction.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
